it.polimi.se2018.network.server

Class CountdownTimer

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2018.network.server.CountdownTimer

  • public class CountdownTimer
extends java.lang.Object
    A countdown timer that can run a user-defined action each second that the timer is going (called ` tick`), each time the timer ends and each time the timer is reset.
    Author:
    MicheleLambertucci

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CountdownTimer(int duration, java.lang.Runnable onTimerEnd, java.lang.Runnable onTimerReset, java.lang.Runnable onTick)
      A timer that lasts `duration` seconds and then resets, can be reset and runs actions when the timer ends and when it resets

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void reset()
      Reset timer to its initial value (`this.duration`)
      void start()
      Start the countdown

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • CountdownTimer

        public CountdownTimer(int duration,
                      java.lang.Runnable onTimerEnd,
                      java.lang.Runnable onTimerReset,
                      java.lang.Runnable onTick)
        A timer that lasts `duration` seconds and then resets, can be reset and runs actions when the timer ends and when it resets
        Parameters:
        duration - Timer duration in seconds
        onTimerEnd - Runnable run when the timer reaches 0
        onTimerReset - Runnable run every time the function `reset` is called
        onTick - Runnable run each second the timer is going down

    • Method Detail

      • start

        public void start()
        Start the countdown

      • reset

        public void reset()
        Reset timer to its initial value (`this.duration`)
